amendatorysection.catchline: Department; powers; grounds for disciplinary action.
amendatorysection.para: The department shall have (1) the authority to inspect any emergency box and (2) access to the records of the supplying pharmacy and the long-term care facility for inspection. Refusal to allow the department to inspect an emergency box or to have access to records shall be grounds for a disciplinary action against the supplying pharmacy or the license of the long-term care facility.
